item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - E102E10
item.description:
Sep 4, 10:09 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 04/09/2022 04:51 UTC
End Time : 04/09/2022 10:08 UTC
Service impact : Public network was unavailable on some servers in rack E102E10
Root cause : A network equipment caused the incident

Sep 4, 07:25 UTC
Identified - Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently replacing the defected equipment which will cause the public network to be temporarily unavailable for all servers in rack E102E10.

Sep 4, 06:38 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 04/09/2022 04:51 UTC
Service impact : Public network is unavailable on some servers in rack E102E10
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem

item.title: [RBX4][Network] - Rack 55C25
item.description:
Sep 4, 01:42 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 04/09/2022 01:04 UTC
End Time : 04/09/2022 01:39 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted servers are reachable anew.

Sep 4, 01:21 UTC
Identified - Start time : 04/09/2022 01:04 UTC
Service impact : Some servers might have lost their connection.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Root cause : A network equipment unexpectedly rebooted.
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX/BHS][Backup Storage] - Firewall upgrade
item.description:
Sep 2, 12:09 UTC
Completed - Start time : 23/08/2022 06:30 UTC
End time : 30/08/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Slowdowns (a few seconds) may be observed during the deployment on your specific server.
Service improvement : Following the incident that occurred during the maintenance in https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/c205tcjnl5q4, new deployment has been done successfully.

Aug 30, 14:52 UTC
Verifying - The maintenance is completed, we keep the task in monitoring to validate the maintenance.

Aug 23, 06:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 2, 22:32 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/08/2022 06:30 UTC
End time : 30/08/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Slowdowns (a few seconds) may be observed during the deployment on your specific server.
Service improvement : Following the incident that occurred during the maintenance in https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/c205tcjnl5q4, we've rollback the change and we are now ready to plan a new deployment.
